title: Fact Check: Trump's Claim on Charlotte Stabbing Death
summary: Trump incorrectly stated the suspect in a Charlotte stabbing was an immigrant. The suspect was a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Misinformation can impact public perception of immigration and crime, influencing policy debates.

title: Hayward Plant a Major Employer in Clemmons, NC
summary: Hayward, a swimming pool filter maker based in Charlotte, employs over 1,000 workers in Clemmons.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the importance of manufacturing jobs in smaller North Carolina communities.

title: Charlotte Trade Shows Focus on ROI with Canopy Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows.
charlotte_impact: Reflects strategies businesses use to maximize impact at local trade events.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks New Vice President
summary: Charlotte-based Mosaic Capital Partners is seeking a Vice President of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment in private equity within the Charlotte area.

title: Florence Airport Traffic Rises Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025, despite losing an American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Shows the fluctuating dynamics of regional air travel and connectivity.

title: Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in Charlotte
summary: Three women in Charlotte are accused of torturing and killing a child, keeping her in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Highlights severe cases of child abuse and the need for protective services.

title: Homeowners Reassessing Sell Time Due to Market Shift
summary: Homeowners are reconsidering when to sell their homes as market conditions change.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the evolving real estate market and its impact on homeowners' decisions.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Partnerships
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and expanded economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the role of consulting firms in driving economic activity.

title: Foggy Start, Warmer Weekend for the Carolinas
summary: Patchy fog is expected overnight, with a much warmer weekend across the Carolinas.
charlotte_impact: Provides a brief weather forecast affecting weekend activities.

title: Kannapolis Honors Corine Cannon with Bridge Designation
summary: Kannapolis leaders honor Corine Cannon, 106, for her dedication to justice in the community.
charlotte_impact: Recognizes the contributions of long-standing community members.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte
summary: The I-485 Express Lanes in south Charlotte are now open, offering a faster route for drivers.
charlotte_impact: Improves transportation infrastructure and reduces commute times.

title: Student Chokes Daughter at Rocky River High School
summary: A Charlotte mother reports her daughter was choked by a student at Rocky River High School.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about school safety and response to violent incidents.

title: Woman Dies After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman has died weeks after being assaulted in east Charlotte. The suspect is in custody.
charlotte_impact: Highlights violent crime and its consequences in the Charlotte area.

title: NC Doctor Loses License for Device Re-use
summary: A North Carolina doctor had her medical license revoked for re-using medical devices in surgeries.
charlotte_impact: Addresses medical malpractice and patient safety concerns.

title: Protest Against Rumored ICE Center in Concord
summary: Protesters oppose a rumored ICE detention center in Concord. Crescent Communities denies the deal.
charlotte_impact: Reflects community concerns about immigration enforcement and detention facilities.
